law.catch_line: Toll-road identification card -- Exemptions from tolls.

text.section: The authority or the cabinet shall establish by administrative regulation promulgated pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A a toll-road identification card to be provided to paying and nonpaying users of toll facilities. The toll-road identification cards shall be issued through an application process. A fee that shall not exceed five dollars ($5) may be established for the issuance of each card.
To receive the exemption contained in subsection (2) of this section, an ambulance service shall be licensed by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 143, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 130, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 122, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.
